analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x971e78e0c92392a4e39099835cf7e6ab535b2227.sol:
	Contract Proxy has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x971e78e0c92392a4e39099835cf7e6ab535b2227.sol#147-167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
